html.p: For this app to work properly, you will need to make the following changes:

ol.li: Create an index named 'extnet' (admin account only). Click here for more details on Indexes.

li.a: Create a new TCP data input for your switch data (admin account only).

ul.li: Set a TCP port -- you will later need to configure your switches to send tech support reports on this port. Our examples use Port 6514.
Under the "Source type" heading, "Set sourcetype" as Manual. Enter 'en-switch' in the "Sourcetype" field.
Set the App Context to "Extreme Networks EXOS for Splunk".
